# tf.contrib.keras.regularizers.L1L2

## Class `L1L2`

Inherits From: [`Regularizer`](../../../../tf/contrib/keras/regularizers/Regularizer)



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/keras/python/keras/regularizers.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/contrib/keras/python/keras/regularizers.py).

Regularizer for L1 and L2 regularization.

#### Arguments:

    l1: Float; L1 regularization factor.
    l2: Float; L2 regularization factor.
